```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
wd="F:/PostDoc/ABoVE"
```

```{r cars,include=FALSE,echo=FALSE}
tspec=read.csv(paste0(wd,"/tdryspec.csv"),head=T)
kspec=read.csv(paste0(wd,"/kdryspec.csv"),head=T)
tspec=tspec[order(tspec$sample_name),]
kspec=kspec[order(kspec$sample_name),]
summary(tspec$sample_name==kspec$sample_name)
tspec=tspec[,-1]
kspec=kspec[,-1]
```

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
newspec=abs(tspec-kspec)
means=colMeans(newspec)
plot(means)
```

## Plots

```{r}
oFST=FST[3555,]
oFSTjc=FSTjc[3555,]
oFSTjcwithours=FSTjcwithours[3555,]

plot(oFST, lwd = 0.25, lty = 1, col = "grey25", main="CHAR_021_DRIN_00000 Spectra")
plot(oFSTjc, lwd = 0.25, lty = 1, col = "red",add=T)
plot(oFSTjcwithours, lwd = 0.25, lty = 1, col = "blue",add=T)
```
